Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package packer for versions less than 1.8.1-14
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package packer for versions less than 1.8.1-14. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package packer is earlier than 1.8.1-14, affected by CVE-2023-44487
